title: Bella Hadid looks like a Ghostbuster as she suits up in a quirky tan outfit during outing in London
text:
Halloween is coming up on October 31.

And on Wednesday, Bella Hadid got an early start on the holiday as she stepped out in London, clad in a quirky ensemble.

The 23-year-old was dressed in a tan outfit, that looked strikingly similar to a Ghostbuster costume.

Interesting look: On Wednesday, Bella Hadid, 23, got an early start on the holiday as she stepped out in London, clad in a quirky ensemble

Bella wore a tan button up decorated with map of the world on it.

The model layered her uniform-like top over a black turtleneck. She completed her look with khaki pants and black chunky boots.

The stunning brunette wore her hair pulled back, and sported glam, bronzy make-up.

Similar: The model was dressed in a tan outfit, that looked strikingly similar to a Ghostbuster costume

Artsy: Bella wore a tan button up decorated with a map of the world on it

On October 9, Bella celebrated her 23rd birthday. This year's celebration was extra special, as she was joined by her on-off love, The Weeknd.

The couple had only split in August, but they appear to been on friendly terms, and are possibly back together.

Bella was celebrating her 23rd birthday with her sister Gigi and pals at Miss Lily's, before leaving the restaurant 'by herself' and getting 'into The Weeknd's car,' a source told E! News.

Keeping warm: The model layered her uniform-like top over a black turtleneck

What a beauty! The stunning brunette wore her hair pulled back, and sported glam, bronzy make-up

Insiders have revealed that Bella received a birthday message from her ex The Weeknd, before leaving dinner in his car, according to E! News.

'The Weeknd did reach out to Bella during the day to wish her a 'Happy Birthday' and they have been in touch,' another source told the site.

Despite their reunion, it appears as though the two are staying single for now.

'There is no bad blood between the two and they are on good terms right now. There isn't any chance of them getting back together right now but Bella never wants to have any anger or resentment towards anyone.'

Reunion: On October 9, Bella celebrated her 23rd birthday. This year's celebration was extra special, as she was joined by her on-off love, The Weeknd

Bella and The Weeknd began dating in around May 2015, after connecting the month before.

The couple would split in November 2016. The Weeknd would go on to date Selena Gomez from January until October 2017.

The following spring, the duo would begin dating again, before splitting up in August.

Their story: Bella and The Weeknd began dating in around May 2015, after connecting the month before
description: Halloween is coming up on October 31. And on Wednesday, Bella Hadid got an early start on the holiday as she stepped out in New York City, clad in a quirky ensemble.
